r.s: An extension to operate with the IMAP protocol, as well as the NNTP, POP3, and local mailbox access methods.
r.d: An extension to operate with the IMAP protocol, as well as the NNTP, POP3, and local mailbox access methods.
r.n: - Fixed package.xml file with required minumum PHP version of 8.3. - Fixed embedded version number.
